00013     {
00014       void *pixels;     // Pixel data
00015       int w, h;         // Width and height
00016       int pitch, bypp;  // Pitch (bytes) and bytes per pixel
00017     };
00018 
00024     struct Sprite
00025     {
00027       virtual void draw(Sprite *s,                // The sprite to draw
00028                         int x, int y,             // Destination position
00029                         int sx=0, int sy=0,       // Source position
00030                         int w=-1, int h=-1        // Amount to draw. -1 means remainder.
00031                         ) = 0;
00032 
00033       virtual ~Sprite() {}
00034 
00035       // Information retrieval
00036       virtual int width() = 0;
00037       virtual int height() = 0;
00038 
00041       virtual void fill(int value) = 0;
00042 
00046       virtual void pixel(int x, int y, int value) {}
00047

00053       virtual void unlock() {}
00054     };
00055   }
